sentence.Network_en: He himself was a bad commander, a boaster and ruffian.
sentence.Network_cn: 他本人是个弊脚的指挥官, 会吹牛皮,又粗鲁残暴.

sentence.Network_en: Don't believe all he says - he's a bit of a boaster.
sentence.Network_cn: 别全信他说的,他有点自吹自擂.

sentence.Network_en: A boaster and a liar are cousins - german.
